{"id":1521692889,"question_id":3416,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737949709,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521692889/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Digit Differences of All Pairs","memory":"115.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long sumDigitDifferences(vector<int>& nums) {\n        //Return the sum of the digit differences between all pairs of integers in nums.\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int m = to_string(nums[0]).length();\n        vector<vector<int>> count(m, vector<int>(10));\n        long long res = 1ll * n *(n-1)/2 * m;\n        for(int num: nums) {\n            for(int k=0; k<m; k++) {\n                res -= count[k][num%10];\n                count[k][num%10]++;\n                num /=10;\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-digit-differences-of-all-pairs","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
